decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 242273HH dated 02/08/2024 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments with approved plans referenced: LR58100 018, LR58 001 pp, LR58 002 pp, LR58100 015, LR58100 016, LR58100 012, LR58100 009, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 242273HH dated 02/08/2024 for: Single storey rear extension. Amendment seeks reconfiguration of approved rear extension to provide rectangular shape and area reduction by 0.5sqm
